definition: to suddenly let a strong force, emotion, etc. be felt or have an effect
a small shellfish that can be eaten, like a prawn but smaller. Shrimps turn pink when cooked.
a shellfish that can be eaten, with ten legs and a long tail. Shrimps turn pink when cooked.
a plant that has small, bright yellow flowers
the whole length of the day
in or behind the stern (= back end) of a ship
in, near or towards the back of a ship or an aircraft
that can be described or considered in terms of one simple factor
having a large stomach that sticks out
